hero.title: Welcome to ZIKYinc
hero.subtitle: Amplifying Underground Creativity
hero.text: Established in 2023 by Juelz-101, ZIKYinc is a groundbreaking record label and art publisher dedicated to discovering and elevating emerging talent. Supporting bedroom producers and developers.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
services: Produce and distribute music across diverse genres.
Develop creative apps and tools to help artists reach their full potential.

cta.title: Join Our Creative Journey
cta.text: Whether you're an artist seeking a platform or a fan discovering new talent, ZIKYinc welcomes you.
